attributes.action: erect fences on motorway and dual-carriageway overpasses to stop dangerous objects being thrown onto traffic and the carriageway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many records of dangerous objects being thrown onto passing vehicles causing injury and death, mainly by children. The simplest solution, I suggest, is to install a high chainlink fence on the overpasses being used for this activity. Very cost-effective.
